text: Laura Wegener Parfrey is a Canadian bioscientist, focusing in ecology, currently a Canada Research Chair at University of British Columbia. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of British Columbia faculty Category:Canadian ecologists Category:University at Albany, SUNY alumni Category:University of Massachusetts Amherst alumni Category:University of Colorado Boulder alumni
title: Laura Wegener Parfrey
